name: Pheasantscene
description:
Extra announcement!!! The greatest discovery of the century!!!

Archeologist Gideon Manboa and his team recently discovered an ancient ruin left by a prehistoric civilization! Journalist Piper Wriboa is now on-site reporting LIVE! It's time to uncover the mystery of the previous civilization and the species that build it!

 

Spoiler Alert!!! The video contains a full playthrough of the game. Watch at your own risk!

 

Thoughts behind the game:

In our time, the consumption of chickens has left countless chicken bones on the earth. If human beings went extinct someday, these chicken bones along with countless plastic and other human wastes will become the most significant mark of our time and civilization.

Nowadays, our archeologists affirm dinosaurs as the nominator of the previous historical era by the great number of dinosaur fossils found beneath the earth. What would the next civilization deduce from our remains? How would they name our era?

My guess is:

Pheasantscene!

 

Credits:

Game made with Unity plugin: Fungus

SFX from Freesound.org
